abstract: Kanishk Tharoor reviews abridged version of 14th-century book The Ultimate Ambition in the Arts of Erudition: A Compendium of Knowledge From the Classical Islamic World by Shihab al-Din al-Nuwayri, edited and translated by Elias Muhanna.
